newsitem.title: USA: Ziegler Q1 loss includes settlement expense.
newsitem.headline: Ziegler Q1 loss includes settlement expense.

text.p: Ziegler Cos Inc, reporting a first-quarter loss, said results included a previously announced $1.4 million provisional settlement with attorneys who expect to represent a class of former bondholders.

The provisional settlement related to an underwriting in 1989. The agreement was the best means to manage the uncertainty and expense of protracted litigation and limit the diversion of management time, said president Peter Ziegler.
Ziegler posted a loss of $0.67 compared to a year-ago profit of $0.08 per share.

It also said profitability of Ziegler Asset Management Inc was down due to an additional investment in staff. The profitability of WRR Environmental Services Inc, the firm's only non-financial subsidiary, was slightly below that of a year ago.
Ziegler, a financial services holding company, was unchanged at 18-5/8.
